block_comment: This Verilog code block represents an initial block utilized to set up the initial states of the variables. It initializes the variables `command`, `command_valid`, and `state` to their respective starting values. `command` is a 4-bit hexadecimal number initialized to zero, `command_valid` is a single bit binary number initialized to zero representing the validity of the `command`, and `state` is a 16-bit hexadecimal number initialized to zero representing the current state of the system.
